A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I consider this a terrible follow up to The Force Awakens\, a film I truly enjoyed.  It's a decent watch\, acting and action wise.  The problems I have w/ the movie are all story elements.  So many things were started in The Force Awakens and were completely abandoned by the new director.  Also the way Luke Skywalker was handled.  I feel like they really didn't do the character justice at all.  In a sense they pretty much tried to ruin him.
